goal.tools.adapt

Interface LearnerAlgorithm

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    QLearner

    public interface LearnerAlgorithm
extends java.io.Serializable
    General interface through which specific learner algorithms can be hooked into the FileLearner.
    Author:
    dsingh, W.Pasman made Serializable #2246

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Returns the learnt action values for a given state

      Called at the end of each episode.

      This is called after each action of the agent.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        void start()
        Called at the start of each episode

      • nextAction

        java.lang.Integer nextAction(java.lang.Integer state,
                           java.lang.Integer[] actions)
        ask the learner which action to execute next. Learner should return action or null.
        Parameters:
        state - is the current state number. See FileLearner.stateid
        actions - is an array with the possible actions at this point. see FileLearner.actionid.
        Returns:
        returns the action index to be executed in the next action. next action or null if no action is available.

      • update

        void update(double reward,
          java.lang.Integer newstate)
        This is called after each action of the agent.
        Parameters:
        reward - The reward is as indicated by MentalState#getReward().
        newstate - a state number, see FileLearner.stateid

        Returns:

        Called at the end of each episode.
        Parameters:
        reward - The reward is as indicated by MentalState#getReward()
